<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OpenMP Spec 5.2: &#91;17.3, 8-9&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If directive-name-A and directive-name-B both correspond to loop-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// associated constructs then directive-name is a composite construct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise directive-name is a combined construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the list of leaf constructs, find the first loop-associated construct,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is the beginning of the returned range. Then, starting from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediately following leaf construct, find the first sequence of adjacent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop-associated constructs. The last of those is the last one of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range, that is, the end of the range is one past that element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If such a sequence of adjacent loop-associated directives does not exist,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return an empty range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The end of the returned range (including empty range) is intended to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a point from which the search for the next range could resume.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consequently, this function can&#39;t return a range with a single leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construct in it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> llvm::omp::Directive &#42;RowA, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> llvm::omp::Directive &#42;RowB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        const auto &#42;BeginB = &amp;RowB&#91;2&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        const auto &#42;EndB = BeginB + static&#95;cast&lt;int&gt;(RowB&#91;1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">          return static&#95;cast&lt;int&gt;(RowA&#91;0&#93;) &lt; static&#95;cast&lt;int&gt;(RowB&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">        return std::lexicographical&#95;compare(BeginA, EndA, BeginB, EndB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
